[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@vue/compiler-core](./compiler-core.md) &gt; [TransformOptions](./compiler-core.transformoptions.md)

## TransformOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TransformOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bindingMetadata](./compiler-core.transformoptions.bindingmetadata.md) | [BindingMetadata](./compiler-core.bindingmetadata.md) | Optional binding metadata analyzed from script - used to optimize binding access when <code>prefixIdentifiers</code> is enabled. |
|  [cacheHandlers](./compiler-core.transformoptions.cachehandlers.md) | boolean | Cache v-on handlers to avoid creating new inline functions on each render, also avoids the need for dynamically patching the handlers by wrapping it. e.g <code>@click=&quot;foo&quot;</code> by default is compiled to <code>{ onClick: foo }</code>. With this option it's compiled to:
```js
{ onClick: _cache[0] || (_cache[0] = e => _ctx.foo(e)) }

```
- Requires "prefixIdentifiers" to be enabled because it relies on scope analysis to determine if a handler is safe to cache.  false |
|  [directiveTransforms](./compiler-core.transformoptions.directivetransforms.md) | Record&lt;string, [DirectiveTransform](./compiler-core.directivetransform.md) \| undefined&gt; | An object of { name: transform } to be applied to every directive attribute node found on element nodes. |
|  [expressionPlugins](./compiler-core.transformoptions.expressionplugins.md) | ParserPlugin\[\] | A list of parser plugins to enable for <code>@babel/parser</code>, which is used to parse expressions in bindings and interpolations. https://babeljs.io/docs/en/next/babel-parser\#plugins |
|  [hoistStatic](./compiler-core.transformoptions.hoiststatic.md) | boolean | Hoist static VNodes and props objects to <code>_hoisted_x</code> constants  false |
|  [isBuiltInComponent](./compiler-core.transformoptions.isbuiltincomponent.md) | (tag: string) =&gt; symbol \| void | If the pairing runtime provides additional built-in elements, use this to mark them as built-in so the compiler will generate component vnodes for them. |
|  [nodeTransforms](./compiler-core.transformoptions.nodetransforms.md) | [NodeTransform](./compiler-core.nodetransform.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of node transforms to be applied to every AST node. |
|  [onError](./compiler-core.transformoptions.onerror.md) | (error: [CompilerError](./compiler-core.compilererror.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void |  |
|  [prefixIdentifiers](./compiler-core.transformoptions.prefixidentifiers.md) | boolean | Transform expressions like {<!-- -->{ foo }<!-- -->} to <code>_ctx.foo</code>. If this option is false, the generated code will be wrapped in a <code>with (this) { ... }</code> block. - This is force-enabled in module mode, since modules are by default strict and cannot use <code>with</code>  mode === 'module' |
|  [scopeId](./compiler-core.transformoptions.scopeid.md) | string \| null | SFC scoped styles ID |
|  [ssr](./compiler-core.transformoptions.ssr.md) | boolean | Generate SSR-optimized render functions instead. The resulting function must be attached to the component via the <code>ssrRender</code> option instead of <code>render</code>. |
|  [ssrCssVars](./compiler-core.transformoptions.ssrcssvars.md) | string | SFC &lt;<!-- -->style vars<!-- -->&gt; injection string needed to render inline CSS variables on component root |
|  [transformHoist](./compiler-core.transformoptions.transformhoist.md) | [HoistTransform](./compiler-core.hoisttransform.md) \| null | An optional hook to transform a node being hoisted. used by compiler-dom to turn hoisted nodes into stringified HTML vnodes.  null |
